Posts.Content: qkidsma wrote: Hello again ladies.  I have been here before and was very lucky to have good results.  I have a new concern and I was just looking for some comments or suggestions.  I was doing my montly self-exam and noticed some milky discharge from my right nipple.  Nothing from my left.  Also, my right breast feels heavier and looks different then my left breast.  Yesterday, I noticed a depression at about the 11:00 position on my right breast that starts above the areola but continues a little bit into it. Something just doesn't feel right with the right breast but I don't know if I am being paranoid or if I should make another appointment to see my regular doctor or what. Just wondering what would be the next best move? Thank you all again ladies for your words of wisdom and your willingness to help and listen. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Question? qkidsma qkidsma

Posts.Content: Feb 27, 2013 02:51PM qkidsma wrote: Jillian, I will check when I get home.  I feel all kinds of lumps but I think I just have lumpy breasts. Will investigate further.  Thank you.
Posts.Title: Question? qkidsma qkidsma

Posts.Content: Mar 1, 2013 11:15AM qkidsma wrote: Emma22, I am kind of in the same boat as you.  In Jan, I went for a diagnostic mammogram and ultrasound on the same breast due to a painful mass.  I had a cyst previously in the same spot so they figured that is what it was.  On ultrasound, they said it looked different then the first time so they wanted to do a biopsy.  When they went to do the biopsy, they could not find the cyst at all.  Then I was put on the 6 month watch and wait routine. Now, when I went to do my SBE this month my right breast is enlarged and I have a dimple that looks like a thumbprint at about the 11:00 position that starts outside the areola but extends a little bit inside too. Also, I noticed a milky discharge during the SBE.  I am not sure if I should go in to the dr again or wait until I have a follow-up appointment with her on the 26th.  I don't want to seem like I am being paranoid or looking for things that aren't there.
Posts.Title: Dimple on Breast and Breast enlarged emma22 emma22
